text: Ek acha theme choose karna bohat zaruri hai.  Free ya paid,  yeh aapki store ki performance ko bohat affect karta hai. Factoryside jaisi website se affordable paid themes mil sakte hain.

step_heading: Homepage aur Product Pages Setup Karen
text: Apne homepage aur product pages ko attractive aur informative banayen.  High-quality images,  clear descriptions, aur strong call-to-actions use karen.

step_heading: Trust Triggers aur Reviews Add Karen
text: Customer trust build karna bohat zaruri hai.  Trust badges,  reviews, aur testimonials add kar ke apne brand ki credibility badhayen.
Limited time offers,  limited stock alerts, aur countdown timers use kar ke customers ko jaldi purchase karne ke liye motivate karen.
Achi sales ke liye,  'Reviews' app,  'Sales Booster' app, aur 'FF Order' app install karen. Yeh apps aapki store ko optimize karne mein madad karengi.
